snippet.title: SGS Battle for Shanghai - Trailer
snippet.description:
Presentation of the trailer introducing the SGS Battle for Shanghai game, a grand tactical simulation of the battle for Shanghai in 1937, from August to November.

Official website: https://strategygamestudio.com/sgs-battles-series/sgs-battle-for-shanghai/
Page on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2595230/SGS_Battle_For_Shanghai/
And our Steam franchise page: https://store.steampowered.com/franchise/sgs/
